result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

records.addlTxt:
Adjourned initial appearance on November 22, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

PARTIES MAY APPEAR AT THE HEARING IN PERSON OR BY VIDEO OR PHONE USING ZOOM UNLESS ORDERED OTHERWISE BY THE COURT. 

To Join By Video:
Copy and paste the following link into your web browser: https://wicourts.zoom.us/j/82280183059
Enter Meeting ID: 822 8018 3059

To Join By Telephone:
Call the following number: 312-626-6799
Enter Meeting ID: 822 8018 3059

Note: To appear by video, you will need a web camera and microphone connected to your computer. If you do not have a microphone connected to your computer, follow the directions to appear by phone.  If you have been unable to join the Zoom meeting by the time scheduled, please call 715-670-0514 immediately so the court has notice and can assist you.

Contacted Vilas County Sheriff's Office via phone and couldn't reach a person to speak with.  Emailed Deputy Crabtree, William Weiss and Lt. Fulton requesting assistance to schedule this hearing via Zoom.

9:23 AM Defendant Virgil H. Smith not in court.  Attorney Jason Matthew Lockery appeared by video for Virgil H. Smith.  Attorney Jensen in court for State of Wisconsin. Court will contact Vilas County for update as to why didnt appear.
Emailed copy of Notice of Hearing and Order Appointing Attorney to Vilas County Jail for Defendant. Requested Jail schedule Zoom appearance for AIA on 10/24/22.

ADDRESS INFO for Virgil H. Smith
Current: c/o Vilas County Jail, 330 Court Street, Eagle River, WI 54521 United States  (Effective: 10-12-2022)
Prior: P.O. Box 891, Black River Falls, WI 54615
Return to sender. Not deliverable as addressed. Unable to forward.
Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward

1:06 PM  Defendant Virgil H. Smith appeared by video, in custody from JCJ.  Attorney Jensen in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Sebion appeared specially, asking court to amend bond down to signature bond. State objects. Court grants request, modifies the bond to signature bond with same conditions. Bail/bond hearing on August 31, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
